pr_title: [BAPL-1778] Adjust features-fuse.xml to Fuse 7.8 and make sure all in…

timeline.message: [BAPL-1778] Adjust features-fuse.xml to Fuse 7.8 and make sure all integration tests work

timeline.bodyText: I have a question about minimal version. Does it make sense to keep it on 4 if we want to update to Spring 5?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 
   <feature name="drools-jpa" version="${project.version}" description="Drools JPA">
     <feature version="${project.version}">drools-module</feature>
-    <feature version="[4,5)">spring-orm</feature>
+    <feature version="[4,6)">spring-orm</feature>

replies.bodyText: If you don't plan supporting Spring 4, then sure, it can be [5,6). I just wanted to change as little as possible.
replies.author: grgrzybek

replies.bodyText: Understand. I agree to keep it as it is and leave this to another PRs. It depends on how will discussions about supported versions finish.
replies.author: jiripetrlik

timeline.author: jiripetrlik
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@
     - hibernate-dependencies
     - hibernate-validator-dependencies
    These features are contained in some repository not referenced explicitly with <repository> (loose coupling).
-   Fuse 7 specific repository is 'mvn:org.jboss.fuse.features/brms-features/VERSION/xml/features'
+   Fuse 7 specific repository is 'mvn:org.jboss.fuse.features/rhba-features/VERSION/xml/features'
